items.title: Wednesday: Heavy Rain
items.description: High: 8°C, Low: 3°C. Expect heavy rain throughout the day with strong winds at 15mph SE.

items.title: Thursday: Partly Cloudy
items.description: High: 10°C, Low: 4°C. Partly cloudy with occasional sunshine. Winds: 8mph NE.

items.title: Friday: Sunny
items.description: High: 13°C, Low: 5°C. Clear skies and plenty of sunshine with light winds at 5mph W.
